# UISplitViewController.LayoutEnvironment.none

**Case**

There is no containing split view controller.

## Declaration

```swift
case none
```

## Constants

- **UISplitViewController.LayoutEnvironment.collapsed**: Contained within a collapsed split view controller.
- **UISplitViewController.LayoutEnvironment.expanded**: Contained within an expanded split view controller.
